section.title: The OFBiz Setup Edit WebSite help screen.
section.para: The WebSite screen is used to manage the details of a WebSite. The WebSite record is used to configure which Product Store to use for your site that references it.

section.title: How do I create a Web Site?

listitem.para: Select the 'Web Site' sub menu and the screen will be displayed
Enter the 'Web Site Id' field (NOTE: If you do not enter the 'Web Site Id' field it will be used the default as 'Organization Party Id')

section.title: How do I update a Web Site?

listitem.para: Not all the fields on the web site can be updated. For example Web Site Id cannot be updated. If these fields need to be amended then the web site will need to be removed and then re-created.
Select the 'Web Site' sub menu and the screen will be displayed
Any existing line items will be displayed in the 'Items' box
Amend the details in the line item that needs to be updated (eg Site Name, Visual Theme Set)
Press the 'Update' button displayed at the end of the line item that has been updated
